TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Larepaq, title = Larepaq, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Larepaq} }

S.FORM: Larepaq Itiniay i Daren Cen no Taitung ko Larepaq a niyaro', 126 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 326 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 99% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 324 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 1% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 2 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan 96%, Amis 1%, Truku 1%, roma 2%.

Larepaq Itiniay i Daren Cen no Taitong ko Larepaq a niyaro', 126 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 326 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 99% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 324 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 1% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 2 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan 96%, Amis 1%, Troko 1%, roma 2%.
